00124 // WANNE 2
00125 void DrawTextOnMapBorder( void )
00126 {
00127       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
00128       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
00129 
00130       // parse the string
00131       swprintf( sString, zMarksMapScreenText[ 24 ] );
00132 
00133       SetFontDestBuffer( guiSAVEBUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00134 
00135       //FindFontCenterCoordinates( MAP_INV_X_OFFSET + MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X, MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_Y - 20,  630 - MAP_INVENTORY_POOL_SLOT_START_X, GetFontHeight( FONT14ARIAL ), sString, FONT14ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
00136 
00137       FindFontCenterCoordinates( 271, 18, SCREEN_WIDTH - 271, GetFontHeight( FONT14ARIAL ), sString, FONT14ARIAL, &sX, &sY );
00138 
00139       SetFont( FONT14ARIAL );
00140       SetFontForeground( FONT_WHITE );
00141       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00142 
00143       mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
00144 
00145       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00146 
00147 }

00150 BOOLEAN LoadMapBorderGraphics( void )
00151 {
00152   // this procedure will load the graphics needed for the map border 
00153       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc; 
00154 
00155       // will load map border 
00156       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00157 
00158       if (iResolution == 0)
00159       {
00160       FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\MBS.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00161       }
00162       else if (iResolution == 1)
00163       {
00164             FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\MBS_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00165       }
00166       else if (iResolution == 2)
00167       {
00168             FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\MBS_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00169       }
00170 
00171       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMapBorder ) );
00172 
00173 /* corner was removed along with the Zoom feature
00174       // will load map border corner
00175       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00176       FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_cutout.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00177       CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMapBorderCorner ) );
00178 
00179       fCursorIsOnMapScrollButtons = FALSE;
00180 */
00181       
00182 
00183       return ( TRUE );
00184 }

00199 void RenderMapBorder( void )
00200 {
00201       // renders the actual border to the guiSAVEBUFFER
00202   HVOBJECT hHandle;
00203 
00204 /*    
00205       if( fDisabledMapBorder )
00206       {
00207             return;
00208       }
00209 */
00210 
00211       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
00212       {
00213             // render background, then leave
00214             BlitInventoryPoolGraphic( );
00215             return;
00216       }
00217 
00218       // get and blt border
00219       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiMapBorder ); 
00220       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0, MAP_BORDER_X, MAP_BORDER_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00221 
00222       // WANNE 2
00223       if (iResolution == 1 || iResolution == 2)
00224       {
00225             DrawTextOnMapBorder();
00226       }
00227 
00228       // WANNE Invalidate!!
00229       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( MAP_BORDER_X, MAP_BORDER_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH - MAP_BORDER_X, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00230             
00231       // show the level marker
00232       DisplayCurrentLevelMarker( );
00233       
00234       
00235       return;
00236 }

00424 void DeleteMapBorderButtons( void )
00425 {
00426       UINT8 ubCnt;
00427 
00428 /*
00429       RemoveButton( guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 0 ]);
00430       RemoveButton( guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 1 ]);
00431       RemoveButton( guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 2 ]);
00432       RemoveButton( guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 3 ]);
00433 */
00434 
00435       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 0 ]);
00436       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 1 ]);
00437       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 2 ]);
00438       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 3 ]);
00439       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 4 ]);
00440       RemoveButton( giMapBorderButtons[ 5 ]);
00441 
00442       //RemoveButton( guiMapBorderLandRaiseButtons[ 0 ]);
00443       //RemoveButton( guiMapBorderLandRaiseButtons[ 1 ]);
00444 
00445       // images
00446 
00447 /*
00448       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderScrollButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00449       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderScrollButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00450       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderScrollButtonsImage[ 2 ] );
00451       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderScrollButtonsImage[ 3 ] );
00452 */
00453 
00454       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00455       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00456       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 2 ] );
00457       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 3 ] );
00458       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 4 ] );
00459       UnloadButtonImage( giMapBorderButtonsImage[ 5 ] );
00460 
00461       //UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderLandRaiseButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00462       //UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBorderLandRaiseButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00463 
00464 
00465       for ( ubCnt = 0; ubCnt < 6; ubCnt++ )
00466       {
00467             giMapBorderButtons[ ubCnt ] = -1;
00468             giMapBorderButtonsImage[ ubCnt ] = -1;
00469       }
00470 }

00533 void BtnMilitiaCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00534 {
00535       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00536       {
00537             CommonBtnCallbackBtnDownChecks();
00538             ToggleShowMilitiaMode( );
00539       }
00540       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00541       {
00542             CommonBtnCallbackBtnDownChecks();
00543       }
00544 }

00668 
00669 void ToggleShowTownsMode( void )
00670 {
00671       if( fShowTownFlag == TRUE )
00672       {
00673             fShowTownFlag = FALSE;
00674             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
00675       }
00676       else
00677       {
00678             fShowTownFlag = TRUE;
00679             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
00680 
00681             if( fShowMineFlag == TRUE )
00682             {
00683                   fShowMineFlag = FALSE;
00684                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
00685             }
00686 
00687             if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
00688             {
00689                   fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
00690                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
00691             }
00692 
00693             if( fShowItemsFlag == TRUE )
00694             {
00695                   fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
00696                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
00697             }
00698       }
00699 
00700       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00701 }
00702 
00703 
00704 void ToggleShowMinesMode( void )
00705 {
00706       if( fShowMineFlag == TRUE )
00707       {
00708             fShowMineFlag = FALSE;
00709             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
00710       }
00711       else
00712       {
00713             fShowMineFlag = TRUE;
00714             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
00715 
00716             if( fShowTownFlag == TRUE )
00717             {
00718                   fShowTownFlag = FALSE;
00719                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
00720             }
00721 
00722             if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
00723             {
00724                   fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
00725                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
00726             }
00727 
00728             if( fShowItemsFlag == TRUE )
00729             {
00730                   fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
00731                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
00732             }
00733       }
00734 
00735       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00736 }
00737 
00738 
00739 void ToggleShowMilitiaMode( void )
00740 {
00741       if( fShowMilitia == TRUE )
00742       {
00743             fShowMilitia = FALSE;
00744             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
00745       }
00746       else
00747       {
00748             // toggle militia ON
00749             fShowMilitia = TRUE;
00750             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
00751 
00752             // if Team is ON, turn it OFF
00753             if( fShowTeamFlag == TRUE )
00754             {
00755                   fShowTeamFlag = FALSE;
00756                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
00757             }
00758 
00759 /*
00760             // if Airspace is ON, turn it OFF
00761             if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
00762             {
00763                   fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
00764                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
00765             }
00766 */
00767 
00768             if ( fShowItemsFlag == TRUE )
00769             {
00770                   fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
00771                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
00772             }
00773 
00774 
00775             // check if player has any militia
00776             if ( DoesPlayerHaveAnyMilitia( ) == FALSE )
00777             {
00778                   STR16 pwString = NULL;
00779 
00780                   // no - so put up a message explaining how it works
00781 
00782                   // if he's already training some
00783                   if( IsAnyOneOnPlayersTeamOnThisAssignment( TRAIN_TOWN ) )
00784                   {
00785                         // say they'll show up when training is completed
00786                         pwString = pMapErrorString[ 28 ];
00787                   }
00788                   else
00789                   {
00790                         // say you need to train them first
00791                         pwString = zMarksMapScreenText[ 1 ];
00792                   }
00793 
00794                   MapScreenMessage( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_MAP_UI_POSITION_MIDDLE, pwString );
00795             }
00796       }
00797 
00798       fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00799 }

00801 
00802 void ToggleShowTeamsMode( void )
00803 {
00804       if( fShowTeamFlag == TRUE )
00805       {
00806             // turn show teams OFF
00807             fShowTeamFlag = FALSE;
00808             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
00809 
00810             // dirty regions
00811             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00812             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00813             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00814       }
00815       else
00816       {     // turn show teams ON
00817             TurnOnShowTeamsMode();
00818       }
00819 }
00820 
00821 
00822 void ToggleAirspaceMode( void )
00823 {
00824       if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
00825       {
00826             // turn airspace OFF
00827             fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
00828             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
00829 
00830             if( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE )
00831             {
00832                   AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
00833             }
00834 
00835             // dirty regions
00836             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00837             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00838             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00839       }
00840       else
00841       {     // turn airspace ON
00842             TurnOnAirSpaceMode();
00843       }
00844 }
00845

00847 void ToggleItemsFilter( void )
00848 {

00850       {
00851             // turn items OFF
00852             fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
00853             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
00854 
00855             // dirty regions
00856             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
00857             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
00858             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
00859       }
00860       else
00861       {
00862             // turn items ON
00863             TurnOnItemFilterMode();
00864       }
00865 }

01117 
01118 // generic button mvt callback for mapscreen map border
01119 void BtnGenericMouseMoveButtonCallbackForMapBorder(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01120 {
01121       //If the button isn't the anchored button, then we don't want to modify the button state.
01122       
01123       if( btn != gpAnchoredButton )
01124       {
01125             if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01126             {
01127                   if( btn->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_FASTHELP )
01128                   { 
01129                     // redraw area
01130                     fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01131                   }
01132             }
01133             return;
01134       }
01135 
01136       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01137       {
01138             if( !gfAnchoredState )
01139                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );          
01140             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01141       }
01142       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01143       {
01144             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON ;       
01145             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01146       }
01147 }

01157       ( ButtonList[ guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 2 ] ]->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )||
01158       ( ButtonList[ guiMapBorderScrollButtons[ 3 ] ]->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT ) )
01159       {
01160             return( TRUE );
01161       }
01162 
01163       return( FALSE );
01164 }
01165 */

01167 
01168 void DisplayCurrentLevelMarker( void )
01169 {
01170       // display the current level marker on the map border
01171       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01172       
01173 /*
01174       if( fDisabledMapBorder )
01175       {
01176             return;
01177       }
01178 */
01179 
01180       // it's actually a white rectangle, not a green arrow!
01181       GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiLEVELMARKER ); 
01182       BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0,     MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_X + 1, MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_Y + ( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_DELTA * ( INT16 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ), VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
01183 
01184       // WANNE 2
01185       RestoreExternBackgroundRect(MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_X + 1, MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_Y + ( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_DELTA * ( INT16 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ), 55, 9);
01186 
01187 
01188       return;
01189 }
01190 
01191 
01192 void CreateMouseRegionsForLevelMarkers( void )
01193 {
01194       INT16 sCounter = 0;
01195       CHAR16 sString[ 64 ];
01196       
01197       for( sCounter = 0; sCounter  < 4 ; sCounter++ )
01198       {
01199             MSYS_DefineRegion(&LevelMouseRegions[ sCounter ], MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_X, ( INT16 )( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_Y + ( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_DELTA * sCounter ) ),  MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_X + MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_WIDTH, ( INT16 )( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_Y + ( MAP_LEVEL_MARKER_DELTA * ( sCounter + 1 ) ) ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, 
01200                   MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, LevelMarkerBtnCallback );
01201 
01202             MSYS_SetRegionUserData(&LevelMouseRegions[sCounter],0,sCounter);
01203 
01204             swprintf( sString, L"%s %d", zMarksMapScreenText[ 0 ], sCounter + 1 );
01205             SetRegionFastHelpText( &LevelMouseRegions[ sCounter ], sString );
01206   }
01207 
01208 
01209 }
01210 
01211 
01212 void DeleteMouseRegionsForLevelMarkers( void )
01213 {
01214       INT16 sCounter = 0;
01215 
01216 
01217       for( sCounter = 0; sCounter < 4; sCounter++ )
01218       {
01219             MSYS_RemoveRegion(  &LevelMouseRegions[ sCounter ] );
01220       }
01221 }
01222 
01223 void LevelMarkerBtnCallback(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01224 {
01225       // btn callback handler for assignment screen mask region
01226       INT32 iCounter = 0;
01227       
01228       iCounter = MSYS_GetRegionUserData( pRegion, 0 );
01229 
01230       if( ( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) )
01231       {
01232             JumpToLevel( iCounter );
01233       }
01234 }

01273 
01274 void TurnOnShowTeamsMode( void )
01275 {
01276       // if mode already on, leave, else set and redraw
01277 
01278       if( fShowTeamFlag == FALSE )
01279       {
01280             fShowTeamFlag = TRUE;
01281             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
01282 
01283             if( fShowMilitia == TRUE )
01284             {
01285                   fShowMilitia = FALSE;
01286                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
01287             }
01288 
01289 /*
01290             if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
01291             {
01292                   fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
01293                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
01294             }
01295 */
01296 
01297             if( fShowItemsFlag == TRUE )
01298             {
01299                   fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
01300                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
01301             }
01302 
01303             // dirty regions
01304             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01305             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01306             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01307       }
01308 }

01312 void TurnOnAirSpaceMode( void )
01313 {
01314       // if mode already on, leave, else set and redraw
01315 
01316       if( fShowAircraftFlag == FALSE )
01317       {
01318             fShowAircraftFlag = TRUE;
01319             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
01320 
01321 
01322             // Turn off towns & mines (mostly because town/mine names overlap SAM site names)
01323             if( fShowTownFlag == TRUE )
01324             {
01325                   fShowTownFlag = FALSE;
01326                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
01327             }
01328 
01329             if( fShowMineFlag == TRUE )
01330             {
01331                   fShowMineFlag = FALSE;
01332                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
01333             }
01334 
01335 /*
01336             // Turn off teams and militia
01337             if( fShowTeamFlag == TRUE )
01338             {
01339                   fShowTeamFlag = FALSE;
01340                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
01341             }
01342 
01343             if( fShowMilitia == TRUE )
01344             {
01345                   fShowMilitia = FALSE;
01346                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
01347             }
01348 */
01349 
01350             // Turn off items
01351             if( fShowItemsFlag == TRUE )
01352             {
01353                   fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
01354                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
01355             }
01356 
01357             if ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 )
01358             {
01359                   AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
01360             }
01361 
01362 
01363             // if showing underground           
01364             if ( iCurrentMapSectorZ != 0 )
01365             {
01366                   // switch to the surface
01367                   JumpToLevel( 0 );
01368             }
01369 
01370             // dirty regions
01371             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01372             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01373             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01374       }
01375 }

01377 
01378 void TurnOnItemFilterMode( void )
01379 {
01380       // if mode already on, leave, else set and redraw
01381 
01382       if( fShowItemsFlag == FALSE )
01383       {
01384             fShowItemsFlag = TRUE;
01385             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
01386 
01387 
01388             // Turn off towns, mines, teams, militia & airspace if any are on
01389             if( fShowTownFlag == TRUE )
01390             {
01391                   fShowTownFlag = FALSE;
01392                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
01393             }
01394 
01395             if( fShowMineFlag == TRUE )
01396             {
01397                   fShowMineFlag = FALSE;
01398                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
01399             }
01400 
01401             if( fShowTeamFlag == TRUE )
01402             {
01403                   fShowTeamFlag = FALSE;
01404                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
01405             }
01406 
01407             if( fShowMilitia == TRUE )
01408             {
01409                   fShowMilitia = FALSE;
01410                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
01411             }
01412 
01413             if( fShowAircraftFlag == TRUE )
01414             {
01415                   fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
01416                   MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
01417             }
01418 
01419             if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
01420             {
01421                   AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
01422             }
01423 
01424             // dirty regions
01425             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01426             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01427             fCharacterInfoPanelDirty = TRUE;
01428       }
01429 }

01489 
01490 void InitializeMapBorderButtonStates( void )
01491 {
01492       if( fShowItemsFlag )
01493       {
01494             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
01495       }
01496       else
01497       {
01498             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_ITEM_BTN );
01499       }
01500 
01501       if( fShowTownFlag )
01502       {
01503             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
01504       }
01505       else
01506       {
01507             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TOWN_BTN );
01508       }
01509 
01510       if( fShowMineFlag )
01511       {
01512             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
01513       }
01514       else
01515       {
01516             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MINE_BTN );
01517       }
01518        
01519       if( fShowTeamFlag )
01520       {
01521             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
01522       }
01523       else
01524       {
01525             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_TEAMS_BTN );
01526       }
01527       
01528       if( fShowAircraftFlag )
01529       {
01530             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
01531       }
01532       else
01533       {
01534             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_AIRSPACE_BTN );
01535       }
01536 
01537       if( fShowMilitia )
01538       {
01539             MapBorderButtonOn( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
01540       }
01541       else
01542       {
01543             MapBorderButtonOff( MAP_BORDER_MILITIA_BTN );
01544       }
01545 }
01546 
01547 
01548 
01549 BOOLEAN DoesPlayerHaveAnyMilitia( void )
01550 {
01551       INT16 sX, sY;
01552 
01553       // run through list of towns that might have militia..if any return TRUE..else return FALSE
01554       for( sX = 1; sX < MAP_WORLD_X - 1; sX++ )
01555       {
01556             for( sY = 1; sY < MAP_WORLD_Y - 1; sY++ )
01557             {
01558                   if( ( SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sX, sY )].ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ GREEN_MILITIA ] +  SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sX, sY )].ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ REGULAR_MILITIA ]
01559                               + SectorInfo[ SECTOR( sX, sY )].ubNumberOfCivsAtLevel[ ELITE_MILITIA ] ) > 0 )
01560                   {
01561                         // found at least one
01562                         return( TRUE );
01563                   }
01564             }
01565       }
01566 
01567       // no one found
01568       return( FALSE );
01569 }

01572 
01573 void CommonBtnCallbackBtnDownChecks( void )
01574 {
01575       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
01576       {
01577             // stop mapscreen text
01578             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
01579       }
01580 
01581       // any click cancels MAP UI messages, unless we're in confirm map move mode
01582       if( ( giUIMessageOverlay != -1 ) && !gfInConfirmMapMoveMode )
01583       {
01584             CancelMapUIMessage( );
01585       }
01586 }

01590 void InitMapScreenFlags( void )
01591 {
01592       fShowTownFlag = TRUE;
01593       fShowMineFlag = FALSE;
01594 
01595       fShowTeamFlag = TRUE;
01596       fShowMilitia = FALSE;
01597 
01598       fShowAircraftFlag = FALSE;
01599       fShowItemsFlag = FALSE;
01600 }

01603 
01604 void MapBorderButtonOff( UINT8 ubBorderButtonIndex )
01605 {
01606       Assert( ubBorderButtonIndex < 6 );
01607 
01608       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01609       {
01610             return;
01611       }
01612 
01613       // if button doesn't exist, return
01614       if ( giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] == -1 )
01615       {
01616             return;
01617       }
01618 
01619       Assert( giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] < MAX_BUTTONS );
01620 
01621       ButtonList[ giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] ]->uiFlags &= ~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
01622 }
01623 
01624 
01625 void MapBorderButtonOn( UINT8 ubBorderButtonIndex )
01626 {
01627       Assert( ubBorderButtonIndex < 6 );
01628 
01629       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01630       {
01631             return;
01632       }
01633 
01634       // if button doesn't exist, return
01635       if ( giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] == -1 )
01636       {
01637             return;
01638       }
01639 
01640       Assert( giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] < MAX_BUTTONS );
01641 
01642       ButtonList[ giMapBorderButtons[ ubBorderButtonIndex ] ]->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01643 }
